attributes.action: Prevent Post Brexit British Armed Forces integration into an EU defence force.
attributes.background:
Boris Johnson recently announced post-Brexit British Armed forces are to be offered for integration into the Defence Apparatus of the European Union on terms "Closer than a third country" 
This will betray British voters who voted Leave to stop the ambitions of the EU to appropriate our Forces

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

There is currently no EU Defence Force and the Foreign Secretary didn't announce plans to integrate the British Army into a possible future EU defence force, so we're not sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.

You can read about the Foreign Secretary's comments in context here: 
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-offers-deep-security-partnership-with-eu-post-brexit-in-the-face-of-growing-global-threats

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
